events.message: I have filed a claim following a recent car accident where my vehicle was severely damaged in a collision.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as per the vehicle collision details you provided.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist you throughout the auto accident claim process.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged, and the investigation team will begin reviewing the accident details shortly.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any repair estimates to proceed further with your claim.
I have submitted all requested documents, including the police report and detailed photos of the accident and vehicle damage.
Our investigation team has begun examining the submitted materials and contacting involved parties to verify the accident details.
The investigation team has completed their review and confirmed the circumstances surrounding the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for your auto accident claim.
I have reviewed the settlement proposal and provided feedback to clarify some details regarding repair costs.
The claim has been approved after considering all feedback and finalizing the payout amount for vehicle repairs.
The payment for your auto accident claim has been issued and should arrive in your bank account within 3 business days.
Your auto accident claim has now been successfully closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
All records and documentation related to your claim have been securely archived for future reference as per company policy.
